title: ‘Uncertainty’: What Canada’s minority government means for our economy — Down to Business podcast
text:
Welcome to Down to Business, a weekly podcast from the Financial Post.

The Liberals are back in power with a minority government – and that means uncertainty for Canada’s economy and its businesses. This week on Down to Business, host Emily Jackson speaks with BMO chief economist Doug Porter about how the election results could affect deficit spending, the energy sector and the housing market.

You can listen below — or on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher and Google Play, where you can also subscribe to get new episodes every Wednesday morning.

If you have any questions about the show, or if there are topics you want us to tackle, email us: downtobusiness@postmedia.com.
description: Episode 27 of a weekly podcast from the Financial Post
